synchrono.config.title: Synchrono configuration
synchrono.config.time.title: Time
synchrono.config.time.location.title: Server location
synchrono.config.time.location.descripti: The location of the server with as much precision as desired
The latitude of the server in decimal coordinates format
synchrono.config.time.location.longitude: The longitude of the server in decimal coordinates format
The time zone the server is located in. Make sure it is close enough to the location specified above. Examples are 'UTC' or 'Europe/Warsaw' This option will be removed in the future to be retrieved automatically.
synchrono.config.time.miscellaneous.inve: Turn daytime into nighttime and vice-versa
synchrono.config.gametime.title: Game Time
synchrono.config.gametime.enabled.name: Enabled
synchrono.config.gametime.modifiers.desc: These affect in-game tick values after all the calculations were made. You shouldn't really need them, but they are here in case you would like to use them.
synchrono.config.gametime.modifiers.scal: Scales the actual tick value. Not very useful.
synchrono.config.gametime.modifiers.offs: Offsets the actual tick value. If your game is crashing because you started it before the first morning, set the offset to 24000 (this adjusts game time a whole day ahead).
synchrono.config.debug.title: Debug
synchrono.config.debug.tooltip: Options meant for debugging or advanced usage
synchrono.config.debug.toggles.title: Toggles
synchrono.config.debug.toggles.descripti: Toggle different aspects of the mod
Set game time in absolute ticks
synchrono.config.debug.toggles.brute_for: Set game time every single server tick. Rough and may be buggy.
Set the rate at which time advances. Uses Custom Time Cycle.
synchrono.config.debug.toggles.prevent_s: Prevent players from skipping the night by sleeping
synchrono.config.debug.toggles.remove_co: Remove some commands (currently, `/timecycle`) that interfere with this mod.
synchrono.config.debug.api_properties.de: Specify which results to retrieve from the API (sunrise = 0t, sunset = 12000t
synchrono.config.debug.api_properties.su: The property to look up for the time of sunrise
The property to look up for the time of sunset
